titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 131 East 4th Street in Davenport, Iowa, as the "James A. Leach Federal Building".
To designate the United States courthouse located at 131 East 4th Street in Davenport, Iowa, as the "James A. Leach Federal Building."

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 110-132.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 53.

action.text: Ms. Johnson, E. B. moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1505.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 5/15/2007--Passed House amended. (This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on May 8, 2007. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 131 East 4th Street in Davenport, Iowa, as the "James A. Leach United States Courthouse."
